2681212685.itemDescription: Every hit blazes the path to our reclamation.

3012398148.itemDescription: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

3118679308.itemDescription: Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage:  HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR

3118679309.itemDescription: If you've got it, they'll never see it coming.

3164616404.itemDescription: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." - 13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

3164616405.itemDescription: "Yours…not mine." - Renegade Hunter Shin Malphur to Dredgen Yor

3191797830.itemDescription: This weapon is full of it.

3191797831.itemDescription: "They rest quiet on fields afar…for this is no ending, but the eye."

3227022823.itemDescription: "Huddled at the mountain's base, we had no choice but to beat our ploughshares into swords once more."

3490486525.itemDescription: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

3688594189.itemDescription: "Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." —Eris Morn

3705198528.itemDescription: Burn the world. Burn it all.

4100639362.itemDescription: With your own hands you forged the mighty Bolt-Caster. Now take it in hand and unleash its thunder.

99462852.itemDescription: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." —Ikora Rey

99462854.itemDescription: It's not a holdout weapon, it's a pathfinder.

119482464.itemDescription: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

119482465.itemDescription: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

119482466.itemDescription: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

135862170.itemDescription: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." - Toland the Shattered

135862171.itemDescription: Vanguard policy urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.

346443849.itemDescription: ...a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…

346443850.itemDescription: You cannot shake the feeling that this is less a weapon than a doorway.

346443851.itemDescription: Good fighters have contingency plans. Great fighters don't need them.

803312564.itemDescription: Release the storm. Hold nothing back.

1177550374.itemDescription: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland, the Shattered

2055601060.itemDescription: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

2055601061.itemDescription: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

2055601062.itemDescription: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

3614673599.statDescription: Increases the explosion radius of this weapon.

2523465841.statDescription: Increases the speed of projectiles fired by this weapon.

2961396640.statDescription: Rate at which the weapon charges.

2837207746.statDescription: The speed at which you can launch attacks.

2762071195.statDescription: Energy lost when landing attacks with this weapon.

209426660.statDescription: Damage reduction while using this weapon.

925767036.statDescription: How many attacks can be launched before energy is depleted.

4271995221.displayDescription: Increased precision damage. Kills briefly increase damage against next target.

3002204708.displayDescription: This Exotic Sniper Rifle can be equipped in the primary weapon slot.

1528860941.displayDescription: Rounds fired from this weapon seek their targets aggressively.

2425591494.displayDescription: Rockets from this weapon will detonate early based on proximity to targets.

3582449302.displayDescription: Multikills with this weapon spawn Orbs for your allies.

1651022462.displayDescription: Fusion projectiles attach and detonate with a delayed Void blast.

3896456312.displayDescription: Ice Breaker's victims spontaneously combust, dealing damage to others nearby.

824061322.displayDescription: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

3695773985.displayDescription: You gain active camouflage while aiming down the sights.

770631416.displayDescription: Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.

1183516219.displayDescription: Rounds pierce targets and cause lingering damage over time.

3752206822.displayDescription: The last round in a magazine deals bonus damage.

824209275.displayDescription: Bonus damage and stability. Extra precision damage when firing from the hip.

2814215427.displayDescription: This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.

3465602758.displayDescription: Missed shots may be returned to the magazine. Landed shots may be replaced in the magazine from your reserves.

2450150110.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.

127926301.displayDescription: This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held.

731752060.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

4003736558.displayDescription: Crouching increases scope zoom and makes it easier to aim under fire.

3369212512.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon cause a bright flash that can blind nearby enemies.

2887187771.displayDescription: Magazine is refunded if all shots fired are precision kills.

2852658353.displayDescription: This weapon boosts move speed and fires on a hair trigger.

3727135605.displayDescription: Precision kills temporarily increase Agility stat for 15 seconds.

3598160917.displayDescription: Non precision kills temporarily increase Armor stat for 15 seconds.

768224620.displayDescription: Final round of the magazine regenerates and deals bonus damage at the cost of the wielder's life force.

4142402532.displayDescription: Three rapid kills will return a portion of the wielder's health.

2129300632.displayDescription: Release trigger after weapon fire to drop a Solar Damage napalm canister.

3317503477.displayDescription: Expect to find more ammo for this weapon.

3686406336.displayDescription: A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.

3336527326.displayDescription: Use  to guard. Effective against Solar and Void attacks, less effective against Arc attacks.

387492527.displayDescription: Kills with the sword have a chance to grant Orbs.

744321508.displayDescription: Use  to shoot a beam of Arc Light from your sword creating a lingering electrical storm.

3609996527.displayDescription: This weapon regenerates ammo over time.

3879685265.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon have the chance to grant bonus ammo to the magazine.

2568497806.displayDescription: This weapon can be fired in full auto mode.

284093622.displayDescription: Rounds fired from this weapon have no damage falloff, overpenetrate targets and ricochet off hard surfaces.

3119194123.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

3300391898.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine deals bonus damage and has a chance to return health on kill.

1632665602.displayDescription: When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.

4205188814.displayDescription: Dealing damage with this weapon reduces your melee cooldown and grants a chance to fully charge your melee ability with each kill.

164606820.displayDescription: After each kill, this weapon will reload instantly and increase damage for a short time. Kills will help charge your super.

2417835318.displayDescription: Each kill heals you and speeds up reloads.

2626112550.displayDescription: It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.

1863078623.displayDescription: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

319042915.displayDescription: Fires in full auto mode and has a chance to return rounds that miss to the magazine.

3435618587.displayDescription: Charge and equip times are very short immediately after weapon swap.

3283108368.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.

1279198574.displayDescription: This weapon has better handling, rate of fire and stability while the wielder's Super is charged.

192233393.displayDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

2270268283.displayDescription: The longer this weapon is fired, the faster it fires.
